name: UCO Bank Shastradhara Branch
address:

Sahastradhara Rd, Govind Vihar, Dehradun, Gujrara Mansingh, Uttarakhand 248001

reviews.text: This is my personal experience, this bank next to Tibetan dekyiling colony are best. They have well mannered staff and good management agents. Going to get ride of Punjab bank account and moving to uco bank this branch ,since  Punjab bank sahatradhara road agent has unprofessional and Zero patience level.

I don’t know what is this? Pure unprofessional bank. I opened my account in uco bank online and i did full kyc through video kyc.
And when i went to this third class branch they asked for pan aadhar 3 photos and account opening form, what is this?????????? What does online account opening meaning??? Zero star bank. Go for sbi or hdfc.

Best customer service among all nationalism Bank,
Very professional staff and they are very polite behaviour with customer.

New staff is so rude and impolite. Don't know how to handle staff. My ATM card got expired. So new ATM card got issued by head office. But the staff is so lost that without checking they issued a new ATM card. While I tried to get details of the amount deducted from my bank account they didn't responded correctly and no information was received from their side. Such kind of attitude never expected from them. The old staff is very polite but the new one is worst. In the past few months this kind of attitude is observed regularly

Worst service they don't know how to make balance certificate n when they make they didn't mention any bank address n gmail of their bank.it's looks like made from local cyber n my office accecpt only SBI and they didn't accept uco bank balance certificate 👎👎👎👎👎 zero star just close the bank …
Very customer friendly bank. Nice experience.
Best experience and excellence service. Also staff is very polite.

I went to clear my loan which is loan against fd but it took more than a two hours to to compete but still couldn't solve it which is very simple I have deposit whole amount of loan with interest said by them but still they are unable to go through procedure really very poor knowledge or poor facilities what ever but I found it very poor job
Very bad behaviour from bank side.
